name: project-buddy-diy-ai-assistant
description: An intelligent DIY project companion featuring AI-powered guidance, step-by-step instructions, and comprehensive project management tools for home improvement enthusiasts.

scripts.start: npm run client:build && npm run server
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "wait-on tcp:3001 && npm run client:dev"
scripts.build: npm run client:build && npm run server:build
scripts.install:all: npm ci && cd server && npm ci && cd ../client && npm ci
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:client -- --fix && npm run lint:server -- --fix
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:client && npm run type-check:server
scripts.clean:install: npm run clean && rimraf node_modules client/node_modules server/node_modules package-lock.json client/package-lock.json server/package-lock.json && npm run install:all
scripts.render-build: npm run install:all && npm run build:production
